long_description: Decked out in handsome gunmetal and a leather strap, the Vestal Observer Watch sports nautical style and precision movement in a bold design that looks great on sailors and landlubbers alike. Solid stainless-steel case and raised bezel help protect the hardened mineral crystal during intense outdoor activity. Large face features a date window at the 6 o'clock position and luminous hands and markers that are easy to see in daylight and after dark. Accurate Japanese movement drives the 3-hand display of hours, minutes and seconds. Screwdown crown at the 9 o'clock position helps ensure water resistance to 100m (330 ft.). The Vestal Observer watch features a durable and comfortable leather wristband.
short_description: Decked out in handsome gunmetal and a leather strap, the Vestal Observer Watch sports nautical style and precision movement in a bold design that looks great on sailors and landlubbers alike.
